mapper.sql: id, user_name, password, salt, create_date, update_date, update_by, del
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, user_name, password, salt, create_date, update_date, update_by, del) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,
user_name,

del,

mapper.update:
update user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
